channel.title: Making this tree REAPPEAR

item.title: Making this tree REAPPEAR
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

case 1278: if(playerHasItem(1351) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1351) { startAnimation(879); addItem(1511, 1); addSkillXP(1000, 8); sendMessage("You get some logs."); treetimer ++; replaceTree(objectX, objectY, 1342); } else { sendMessage("You need an axe to cut this tree!"); } if (treetimer == 1) { ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 1342, 0, 10); treetimer = 0; } if (treetimer == 5) {//I set it at 5 so it does nothing :) ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 1278, 0, 10); } break;
How would I make that treetimer go to 5 in a matter of seconds?(not by clicking crap)
That does work though, the stump does appear.

Read full topic
